SC2Mod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
SC2Mod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

SC2Mod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
SC2Mod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
SC2Mod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

SC2Mod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
SC2Mod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

SC2Mod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
SC2Mod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !SC2Mod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

SC2Mod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
SC2Mod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !SC2Mod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
